Headline: #28 Stony Island Temporary Reroute at Stony Island/60th
ShortDescription: #28 Stony Island buses are rerouted in both directions via Stony Island, 63rd, Dorchester, 59th and Stony Island, due to police activity near Stony Island/60th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#28 Stony Island buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Stony Island, 63rd, Dorchester, 59th, then resume their normal route on Stony Island, due to police activity near Stony Island/60th.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #8 Halsted Temporary Reroute near Halsted/18th
ShortDescription: #8 Halsted buses rr NB via Halsted, Canal Port, Rebel, 18th & Halsted; SB via Halsted, 18th, Union, Canal Port & Halsted due to street blockage nr Halsted/18th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#8 Halsted buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions due to street blockage near Halsted/18th.

Northbound buses will operate via Halsted, Canal Port, Rebel, 18th, then resume their normal route on Halsted. 

Southbound buss will operate via Halsted, 18th, Union, Canal Port, then resume their normal route on Halsted.

Allow extra travel time.
